metadata.title: CVE-2020-16588 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A Null Pointer Deference issue exists in Academy Software FoundationOpenEXR 2.3.0 in generatePreview in makePreview.cpp that can cause a denialof service via a crafted EXR file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-16588` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr22 - 2.2.0-10ubuntu2.4
openexr - 2.2.0-10ubuntu2.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openexr package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-10ubuntu2.4').
